foreignObject.pre:
redaxmedia@local:~$ chroma-feedback -P=travis --travis-slug=redaxmedia -C=philips_hue chroma-feedback 7.5.0 by Henry Ruhs
✔ Build of redaxmedia/chroma-feedback on travis passed ✔ Build of redaxmedia/grunt-ftpress on travis passed ✔ Build of redaxmedia/grunt-tocgen on travis passed ✔ Build of redaxmedia/handpick on travis passed ✔ Build of redaxmedia/ncss-documentation on travis passed ✔ Build of redaxmedia/ncss-linter on travis passed ✔ Build of redaxmedia/ngx-crud on travis passed
✔ Setting Hue play 1 to build passed. ✔ Setting Hue play 2 to build passed. ✔ Setting Hue play 3 to build passed. ✔ Setting Hue lightstrip 1 to build passed. ✔ Setting Hue lightstrip 2 to build passed.
